name: Mac & Cheese with Trees
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot set over high heat, boil macaroni until tender, about 6â€“8 min.
Meanwhile, chop broccoli florets (aka trees) into bite sized pieces. Stir in trees for the last 1 min of cooking.
Carefully drain, then return noodles and trees to pot. Add milk, seasoning and butter, if using. Stir until evenly mixed. Spoon into bowls.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein (tuna, ground meat, chicken, tofu) and 1 cup mixed veggies and 2 tsp prepared Epicure Dip.
